title: Make landing page more friendly and less scary
body:
I've tried to recommend Wonderland to friends but the scary smiling cat with monster teeth, on an all black background (which won't stop us degen early adopters) seems to add some hesitation on  more mainstream people as to whether the protocol is trustworthy.

I think it's something simple we can do to making entering into this amazing opportunity more appealing to new stakers. 

Can we use more calming colors and a more friendly cat, similar to the style the AVAX landing page uses on:
https://www.avax.network/

Doesn't have to be exactly like the above example, just something that doesn't scream, "you're in danger"...
author: 0x57C08EC567A930eE1Aaa1EC17Ef791d4305c5984
